activities: Correspondence Management Solutions manages email and paper-based mail generation and delivery.  The generation and delivery of electronic and paper-based communication is performed under contract with business partners that require communications to be sent to recipients in the United States, European Union.  Personal information such as name and mailing address and email address is managed for recipients in the EU.  Personal information such as name, address, and client specific data may also be received as a response to a request for information made on behalf of a business partner.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Printing & Graphic Arts Equipment - (PGA)Computer Services - (CSV)
recoursemech: Correspondence Management Solutions commits to comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities.
